{"id":1094672776,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1699470301,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1094672776/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Determine if a Cell Is Reachable at a Given Time","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isReachableAtTime(int sx, int sy, int fx, int fy, int t) {\n        int x = abs(sx - fx);\n        int y = abs(sy-fy);\n        if(max(x,y)==0 && t==1)\n            return false;\n        return max(x,y) <= t;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"determine-if-a-cell-is-reachable-at-a-given-time","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
